interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2017/03/26
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'Español (España)', 'Italiano', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Mario Van Peebles', 'Peter Medak', 'Christine Moore', 'Sarah Pia Anderson', 'Ali Selim', 'Stephen Surjik', 'Tim Hunter', 'Kate Woods', 'Ben Watkins'], 'Producers': ['Ben Watkins', 'Marc Forster', 'Brian Wilkins', 'Ron Perlman', 'Jim Dunn', 'Sam Ernst', 'Michael Angeli', 'Jillian Kugler', 'Craig Siebels', 'Shernold Edwards', 'Erik Lee'], 'Starring': ['Ron Perlman', 'Dana Delany', 'Andre Royo'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']}
Review Text: Wildly eclectic story that doesn't fit neatly into any particular genre and is sure to find a niche audience who will just love it.  More like a spy drama than a crime story, it attracts viewers who like character studies as well as intrigue.  It requires your patience, your attention, and a willingness to be wrong as you make predictions about what happens next.  The story is so skillfully layered.  It mainly focuses on the frailties of the powerful and the dynamics of the selfish and self serving people they attract but there's so much more to it.  I just LOVE it.  Of course, the acting is excellent.  The Harris' are cast with perfection.  The tweeking preacher is a stroke of genius as he is an all too common reality.  I suspect his delusions will enter into the story as they develop along with his addiction, ooo.  The writers are so much more clever and courageous than most and I hope I am not made to wait in vain for the completion of the story.  It is one of those tales that is full of surprises.  It is just too good to drop!  Niche audiences matter too, ;)  I am sure that a production like this has staying power.  The story is unlikely to ever become irrelevant or dated.  While the masses aren't flocking to watch it now, it is a story that can continue to find an adoring audience over time.  I hope this will be taken into consideration when making decisions on the future of this production.
Review Title: BRAVO!!!  MORE MORE MORE , PLEASE :)
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to have a deep appreciation for British dramas with intricate narratives and emotional depth, now showing a pronounced affinity for eclectic storytelling that blends genres, particularly spy dramas that delve into character studies and intrigue. Their enjoyment of comedies featuring seasoned actors remains, highlighting a growing appreciation for clever humor.

- **Language:** Their preference for English content and enhancements like audio descriptions and subtitles endures, enhancing their viewing experience.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user maintains a careful rating approach, consistently scoring between 4.5 and 5.0. A recent perfect score reflects their enthusiasm for exceptional performances and engaging narratives, underscoring their versatile taste.

- **Engagement Style:** Their analytical reviews emphasize emotional resonance and narrative quality, with an appreciation for ethical dimensions in storytelling. They show insight into layers within plots, valuing patience and attention from viewers.

- **Themes:** The user favors originality and darker themes but remains receptive to lighter narratives that provide depth. They seek authenticity in cultural discussions and recognize niche audiences.

- **Favorite Elements:** They look for high-quality productions led by acclaimed directors and talented casts, favoring thought-provoking content that addresses complex social issues, while being critical of sensationalism.

This update reflects their evolving taste and enthusiasm for nuanced character portrayals in both drama and comedy, as well as their insight into layered storytelling.
